about_the_game:
Unlock game: [Hell mode+Nightmare mode+Death mode]


1 [Rich gameplay]
Intimate interaction with NPCs to receive blessings from beautiful women; Multi instance gameplay: Elite battlefield, BOSS battlefield.




2【 harem system 】
Your exclusive harem, intimate with multiple beautiful NPCs; Through special interactive methods, when receiving blessings from beautiful women, the hero's attack power can be increased. In addition, the emotional value of beautiful women can be increased, and they can also strip and interact with characters.


3【 Multi instance System 】
BOSS Battlefield: A large number of junior bosses can freely brush advanced equipment; Elite Battlefield: A large number of elite players upgrade materials and rare items; Conventional Battlefield: Experience points, unlimited drop of primary materials

4 【 Favorite rating system 】
Frequent interaction with NPCs can enhance her favorability. When your favorability reaches 60 or above, there is a chance that she will appear on the battlefield during your battle and release her skills to assist you in the battle!

5【 Reincarnation Mode 】
After killing the ultimate boss and replacing him as the new ruler of the underworld, the character can reincarnate and unlock new characters to continue challenging new hegemony. After each round of challenges, the overall difficulty of the game will increase by 20%!

6【 Plot and Story System 】
500 main storyline levels, 7 major storyline bosses, 50+regular bosses, and nearly a hundred elite types; The main storyline, storyline, treasure dungeons, and character rotation system allow the game to be played infinitely.

7【 Unlimited Upgrade System 】
Fast upgrade, up to level 1000; Can face stronger bosses and challenges from elite monsters!

8【Evolutionary System】
When a character reaches a certain level, it can evolve into a high-level skeleton, and skills can evolve together. Skills and character growth will also evolve with it! The combat power of evolved heroes has been greatly enhanced.

9【 Mild Roque gameplay 】
Random upgrade rewards, random boss kill rewards, random maps, random monster types, random monster types~; Every time I challenge myself after reincarnation, my feelings are different

10【Equipment System】
Distinguish equipment colors and enhancement levels, types of accessory damage, unlimited equipment enhancement levels, use enhancement stones and rare equipment to create super divine equipment

11【 Achievement System 】
Display in the reincarnation room: number of monsters killed, number of elites killed, number of bosses killed, reincarnation level, and number of beautiful women in the harem. Enable you to achieve success and satisfaction in the game


12【 Special World Setting 】
The character was born in the underworld, also known as the underworld. The world is built by death and soul. Here, you can meet famous figures from any period in history, and even conquer them!
